## isString() function

Determines whether the input is string or not.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isString(input: unknown): input is string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

input


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

input


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

input is string

true if the input is string, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
isString("string") // true
isString('string') // true
isString(`string`) // true
isString(123)      // false
```
